thread.section_title: France Eiffel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of France Eiffel Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Christiane A
title: Great location
text: This hotel was nice. Great location. Near the Eiffel Tower and great restaurants nearby. The room was small but we only needed a comfy bed to sleep on and I clean bathroom. The shower didn't have a shower curtain. We just has to be careful not making a mess. The breakfast was perfect. Cheese, breads, good selection of protein, yogurt, coffee and tea, just perfect. Staff was nice, helpful and friendly. We would stay at this place again.
